SEARCH
Package env.utils

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
env.utils.Cell
public class Cell extends Object
Represents a single cell on the game map. Each cell can contain a zone type, a structure, a resource, and an agent. This class manages the state of the cell and provides methods for interacting with its contents.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new Cell with the specified zone type and coordinates.

      public Cell(Zone zoneType, int x, int y)
      Constructs a new Cell with the specified zone type and coordinates.
      Parameters:
      zoneType - the type of zone this cell belongs to.
      x - the x-coordinate of the cell.
      y - the y-coordinate of the cell.

      public MapStructure getStructure()
      Returns the structure contained in this cell.
      Returns:
      the structure, or null if no structure is present.

    • setStructure

      public void setStructure(MapStructure structure)
      Sets the structure contained in this cell. Throws an exception if the cell already contains a resource or an agent.
      Parameters:
      structure - the structure to place in the cell.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the cell is already occupied by a resource or an agent.

    • getResource

      public Resource getResource()
      Returns the resource contained in this cell.
      Returns:
      the resource, or null if no resource is present.

    • setResource

      public void setResource(Resource resource)
      Sets the resource contained in this cell. Throws an exception if the cell already contains a structure or an agent.
      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • getAgent

      public Agent getAgent()

    • setAgent

      public void setAgent(Agent agent)
      Sets the agent contained in this cell. Throws an exception if the cell already contains a structure or a resource.
      Parameters:
      agent - the agent to place in the cell.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the cell is already occupied by a structure or a resource.

    • isOccupied

      public boolean isOccupied(Agent movingAgent, Resource movingResource)
      Checks if this cell is occupied by a structure, resource, or agent. Considers special cases for walkable structures (destroyed trees/gates, gates of the same team) and agents carrying resources.
      Parameters:
      movingAgent - The agent that may be moving into the cell (used for gate checks).
      movingResource - The resource that may be moving into the cell (used for carried resource checks).
      Returns:
      true if the cell is occupied, false otherwise.
